thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com
thread.title: Barb

author: Barb
title: Barb
text:
I purchased a sim card for travelling to Cuba.
It worked perfect, I could talk and text with no trouble
and it did not cost me a lot of money. I put 50.00 on my account
stayed for a week in cuba and still have 26.00 left and I did a lot of texting.
I called customer service when I first got the card and I was walked through
the entire process, they where so friendly because I am computer challenged for sure. I am heading back to cuba next month and will be taking my phone with the one sim card in it.
Works great for me!!
